body:
Comment 1 by **debrabander**: 
It's indeed desirable to have tar archives available for download from the golang.org
website. For everyone who somehow cannot checkout the source, I've uploaded a archive
here. But of course you will have no way of knowing for sure that I have uploading
the original source ;-)
Attachments: 1. google_go_20091111.tar.bz2 (3533800 bytes)
